featured.text: Our bodies have evolved to exist within Earth’s gravity (1 g), not in the weightlessness of space (0 g) or the microgravity of Mars (0.3 g).

definition.zh_def: 失重狀態，指物體在自由下落或在太空中時，感覺不到重力的影響。
definition.en_def: The condition in which no weight is felt, typically experienced in free fall or in space.
definition.example: Astronauts experience weightlessness while orbiting the Earth.
